description: Optional part of a TableUpdateTransactionRequest to provide information needed to create a new version of a table entity.

createNewTableVersion.description: Should a new table version be created if this transaction is successful?

newVersionComment.description: Optional. If createNewTableVersion=true, the comment to be applied to the resulting version.  Null by default

newVersionLabel.description: Optional. If createNewTableVersion=true, the label to be applied to the resulting version.  Null by default

newVersionActivityId.description: Optional. If createNewTableVersion=true, the Activity ID to be applied to the resulting version.  Null by default
